mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.user_name as "userName", a.password as "password", a.name as "name", a.state as "state", a.create_user as "createUser.id", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_user as "updateUser.id", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.del_flag as "delFlag", d_u_state.name as "stateName"
left join sys_dict d_u_state on d_u_state.value = a.state and d_u_state.label = 'user_state'
mapper.select: select user_name as userName from sys_user a where a.user_name = #{userName} limit 1

select
from sys_user a
order by a.create_date
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(id, user_name, password, name, state, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, del_flag) value(#{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{state}, #{createUser.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_user
name = #{name},
user_name = #{userName},
password = #{password},
state = #{state},
update_user = #{updateUser.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
